1.title: ABBEY OF SAINT HILAIRE - FRANCE
1.description: The monks at the Abbey of Saint Hilaire in southwest France created the world's first champagne in 1531 - that's 137 years BEFORE Dom Perignon struggled with his troublesome wines that bubbled (and exploded) in the more northern province of Champagne!
